channel.title: CVE Feed for Canonical -- byobu

item.title: CVE-2019-7306|2024-08-04T20:46:46.132Z -- canonical -- byobu
item.description: Byobu Apport hook may disclose sensitive information since it automatically uploads the local user's .screenrc which may contain private hostnames, usernames and passwords. This issue affects: byobu
